entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
